messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
OK, OK!
Let’s be quick about this!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Oh, yeah? Let’s do this again!
...Oops. I’m out of Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Yup! Good going!
I like the way you battle!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
What took you so long?We’ve waited here a long time for
a rematch with you!
